article.headline: Charting a constructive Q4 start:  S&P 500, Dow industrials reclaim key resistance
article.body: U.S. stocks are higher early Thursday, rising to start the fourth quarter amid continued optimism over a potential fiscal stimulus package. Against this backdrop, the S&P 500 and Dow industrials have extended mid-week breaks atop the 50-day moving average, punctuating a bullish reversal to firmer technical ground. Before detailing the...
